forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening. A few showers developing late. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 7C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High near 45F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
